casebody.data:
ST. LOUIS-SAN FRANCISCO RAILWAY COMPANY, a Missouri corporation, v. Ross RIZLEY, United States District Judge for the Western District of Oklahoma. No. 6177. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Sept. 14, 1959. Ben Franklin, Oklahoma City, Okl., for petitioner. H. A. Leatherman, Oklahoma City, Okl., for respondent.

Before MURRAH, Chief Judge, and PHILLIPS and PICKETT, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Petition for writ of mandamus granted and cause ordered transferred to the Western District of Arkansas.
